concept.title: View the summary of a Test Result's status change

conbody.p: No matter how many times a test result has been modified, you can always view the full history of changes.

li.p: Mouse over the Information icon next to the Test Result status, then click View changes log.

conbody.p: Now you can view the following information:

ul.li: the original status of a Test Result.
the latest status of that Test Result.
further detailed changes of that Test Result.
